attributes.action: Conduct overhaul of cuurent maternity/paternity pay conditions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mothers to be entitled to 1 years maternity leave of which 6 months is full pay and 6 months at 50%, thus reducing the drastic loss of income which happens presently after 6 weeks.
In turn this will reduce the need to claim benefits and tax credits and will be of great benefit to one parent families. Give fathers 1 month off on full pay and up to 2 months on 50% pay which must be taken in the childs first year. Ensure that parents jobs remain open for 1 year and where possible try to provide companies with the ability to provide in-house child care such as creches etc, which will help encourage parents to go back to work even if only part-time to start with.
After the childs first year if the parent decides not to return to his/her job and they have a partner who is working, the partners tax rate for the next 2 years will only be 10% and those earning below 20k per annum will be entitled to help with their rent and council tax.
Do not penalise the family unit encourage it and help it to provide a better start for the child and remove the stress that a loss of income can put on a family especially, first time parents as well as encouraging companies and businesses to provide more assistance to there employees
